product_name: Novara Flirt Pedal Pusher Bike Capri Pants - Women's
long_description: You'll love the women's Novara Flirt Pedal Pusher Bike Capri Pants both on and off the bike. Stretch fabric and a gel chamois make these a comfy choice for mild weather and casual riding. Nylon/spandex blend offers 2-way stretch, wind resistance up to 20 mph, and a durable water repellent finish that lets water bead up and roll off. Stretch-mesh liner shorts allow ample ventilation and have a women-specific, Novara Gel chamois that conforms to body contours. Novara Flirt Pedal Pusher Bike Capri Pants have 2 zippered hand pockets. Rolling up left cuff exposes reflective trim on the underside that increases visibility in low light.
short_description: You'll love the women's Novara Flirt Pedal Pusher Bike Capri Pants both on and off the bike. Stretch fabric and a gel chamois make these a comfy choice for mild weather and casual riding.
